name: Oddria!
description:
Welcome, our fellow adventurer from Oddria! You are an explorer of Oddria who left for a mysteriously uninhabited island in search of tremendous treasures.
Collect resources to build your outpost and use a compass to find hidden ancient treasures.
WATCH OUT! Your competitors will keep chasing you to steal your valuable treasures. Protect the treasure until a returning ship comes, all the adventures will be an enchanting story that something you can show off.
